seeds.title: Seed 1 - Lay of The Land
seeds.descriptionText:
17 total Unique Shards Needed to finish the race
7 needed as an individual to burn the Sealing Tree

DLC Gaols, Catacombs, Caves, and Demi-Human Queen Marigga are now apart of the Checks Included

Of the New Included Checks: only Marigga can drop Scadutree Fragments

Custom Starting Classes with Unique Weapons, you are allowed to switch if something catches your eye while looting the seed

As a Reminder Messmer must be killed by at Least one player on a team

O Mother Checker was used Meaning the Emote 'O Mother' cannot be at Jori, Midra, PK, Sennsesax, Bayle, Messmer, Gauis

seeds.title: Seed 2 - Melatonin
seeds.descriptionText:
You and your teammate may have taken some Off-Brand Melatonin.
Your bodies may reject it and who knows what the consequences will be.

One of the Consequences for us is that I can't remember if I ran the O'Mother Checker or not.

Don't Forget about Messmer, someone will have to deal with whatever is there.
And we're Back to the Basic Checks

The Goal Remains the same, Both Players must Defeat the Consort Replacement.

seeds.title: Seed 3 - Third Wheel
seeds.descriptionText:
17 Unique Messmer Kindling Shards are required to defeat the PCR replacement and finish the race.

There is no shard requirement for Enir Elim, but you can't burn the Sealing Tree.

To enter Enir Elim, each teammate must blow one of the two horns (Finger Ruins of Rhia or Dheo) — you cannot use the same horn as your partner. Blowing a Horn will automatically Teleport you to Enir Elim, but you must wait for the Item Drop. You can blow the horn at anytime to enter. Be safe and grab a Grace in Enir Elim, who know what lies ahead.

This is a magic-focused seed:
• You may only use Incantations or Sorceries
• Choose only from the first five starting classes
• One player must specialize in Incants, the other in Sorceries

You are given Starlight Shards which can be traded with Corhyn and the Twin Maiden Husk for special items.

Weapons are NOT allowed. Use only the spells provided, summons, and Spirit Ashes. Teammates may not use the same Spirit Ashes.

The O Mother Checker was used for this seed — whether the result is valid or cursed is up to you to discover.
Messmer IS NOT required this Seed.

Mausoleums do not allow summons. Plan accordingly.
Revered Spirit Ashes are not vanilla anymore. Instead they can only be found in the avaliable 35 Key Item Checks.

All Incants, Sorceries, Seals, and Staves have 0 requirements.

More information about the classes can be found on the Github when released.

Good luck.

seeds.title: Seed 4 - Eastern Cerulean Route
seeds.descriptionText:
17 Unique Shards are required to defeat the Consort replacement.
7 Shards are needed individually to burn the Sealing Tree.

Messmer must be killed by at least one player on the team.
We called in a favor to give you +24/+9 Starting Weapons

Seek not the place you swore you knew,
Its echo now is laggin’.
Slumber awakens the Dragon and Madness abandons the eye,
Their hidden paths shift dusk to dawn beneath a broken sky.
